Package eg.ui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConsoleOpenable
    Interface to ask if the console is visible and to open the console in MainWin
    LineNrWidthAdaptable
    Interface to revalidate the edit area when the width of the area that shows line numbers has to change
    ProjectStateUpdate
    Interface to update MainWin depending on the assigned projects and the currently active project
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConsolePanel
    Defines the panel which contains a text area for messages and for reading in text and also a toolbar.
    EditArea
    Defines the panel that contains the area for editing text and the area that displays line numbers.
    EditToolPanel
    Defines the panel to which a variable Component can be added.
    Fonts
    Holds static fonts whose sizes are scaled to the screen resolution.
    FontSettingWin
    The dialog for setting the font and font size
    IconBuilder
    The creation of an icon
    IconFiles
    Static ImageIcons
    InfoWin
    The window that shows info about Eadgyth
    MainWin
    The main window
    StatusBar
    Defines the status bar
    ToolBar
    Defines the tool bar
    UIComponents
    Static methods to create UI components with common behaviours, layouts or colors
    ViewSettingWin
    The dialog to enter preferences for the display of the main window
